nodes.text: The Official Star Wars Cookbook: May the Fork Be With You: 128 Recipes Inspired by the Star Wars Universe

The Official Star Wars Cookbook: May the Fork Be With You: 128 Recipes Inspired by the Star Wars Universe is a Star Wars activity book where the reader can create various meals that are based on characters and objects in the Star Wars franchise. It was released on September 27, 2016.

May the Fork Be With You is for kids and any Star Wars fan, including such recipes as Chewbacca Chewy Bars, Mango Fett and Nabooberry Smoothies, Ham Solo, Darth Maulted Milk Shakes, Scuffy Looking Nerfburgers, and more. New Star Wars characters and plot lines offer an array of themes and topics for a unique and fun cookbook with recipes that will be fun for the entire family. Includes 128 fun recipes for kids and their parents to create tasty meals and delightful treats together.
